erics.name: vogue eric
erics.details: he's a fancy boy out on the town

erics.name: approving eric
erics.details: he likes what you're doing and he thinks you should keep it up

erics.name: concerned eric
erics.details: 'what are you doing?' he wonders, furrowing his brow.

erics.name: friendly eric
erics.details: he exclaims 'hey friends!', and he truly means it.

erics.name: hungry eric
erics.details: wow he needs to eat and he needs to eat now

erics.name: litty eric
erics.details: party boy out on the town

erics.name: not so proud eric
erics.details: he likes to think you know better

erics.name: proud eric
erics.details: he is very impressed like a brother, or dad.

erics.name: spicy eric
erics.details: spiced life is the life for him

erics.name: baby eric
erics.details: what's that there on his head?
